name: Legacy of the Healer
description:
Legacy of the Healer was made within 48 hours for the Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam, with the theme being ONLY ONE.

I chose to have a wizard, who can only cast a single spell. Luckily for him, all the enemies are undead, so he actually has a chance at least!

I'm open for evaluation about the game, but I will not be updating this project (except for bugs / spalling mistakes).

Lastly, thanks for playing!
